languages.text: "Когда ксеносы тащили меня, плененного, Арнульф настиг их и изрубил с десяток своей славной секирой, а Скьядди призвал шторм столь могучий, что реациклы нелюдей кружились в бурных потоках ветра, словно листья. Но даже их мощи не хватило на всех... Мы оказались в плену. Первым Тервантьяс забрал Скьядди и сотворил с его телом... немыслимое. Затем он забрал Арнульфа, и много часов под пыткой мой брат отвечал выродку презрительным хохотом, а затем умолк".

"When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."
languages.original_text: "Когда ксеносы тащили меня, плененного, Арнульф настиг их и изрубил с десяток своей славной секирой, а Скьядди призвал шторм столь могучий, что реациклы нелюдей кружились в бурных потоках ветра, словно листья. Но даже их мощи не хватило на всех... Мы оказались в плену. Первым Тервантьяс забрал Скьядди и сотворил с его телом... немыслимое. Затем он забрал Арнульфа, и много часов под пыткой мой брат отвечал выродку презрительным хохотом, а затем умолк".

traits.locale_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the inhumans' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the inhumans' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

traits.locale_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando los xenos me capturaron, Arnoolf los alcanzó y mató a una veintena de ellos con su hacha, mientras que Skyaddi provocó una tormenta tan poderosa como para lanzar las motos a reacción de esas abominaciones como si fueran hojas esparcidas por el viento. Pero ni siquiera eso bastó para eliminarlos a todos. Tervantias empezó por llevarse a Skyaddi y convirtió su cuerpo en... algo irreconocible. Después se llevó a Arnoolf. Durante las muchas horas de tortura, mi hermano solo respondió con risa desdeñosa hasta que fue silenciado».
languages.original_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los xenos me capturaron, Arnoolf los alcanzó y mató a una veintena de ellos con su hacha, mientras que Skyaddi provocó una tormenta tan poderosa como para lanzar las motos a reacción de los inhumanos como si fueran hojas esparcidas por el viento. Pero ni siquiera eso bastó para eliminarlos a todos. Tervantias empezó por llevarse a Skyaddi y convirtió su cuerpo en... algo irreconocible. Después se llevó a Arnoolf. Durante las muchas horas de tortura, mi hermano solo respondió con risa desdeñosa hasta que fue silenciado».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “当那群异形带走我的时候，阿努尔夫追上了他们，用他那把锋利的斧头砍死了几十个异形。海加迪召唤了一场巨大的风暴，那些异形的喷气摩托就像树叶一样，被卷进了狂风中。但即便是这样，也没能把他们彻底消灭……我们全沦为了俘虏。特万提亚斯先是带走了海加迪，把他的身体变成了某种……不可名状的东西。然后，他带走了阿努尔夫。在长达几个小时的折磨中，我的兄弟对那个怪物唯一的反应就是不屑的笑声。随后，他就再也没有发出声音。”
languages.original_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

traits.locale_text: “当那群异形带走我的时候，阿努尔夫追上了他们，用他那把锋利的斧头砍死了几十个异形。海加迪召唤了一场巨大的风暴，那些异形的喷气摩托就像树叶一样，被卷进了狂风中。但即便是这样，也没能把他们彻底消灭……我们全沦为了俘虏。特万提亚斯先是带走了海加迪，把他的身体变成了某种……不可名状的东西。然后，他带走了阿努尔夫。在长达几个小时的折磨中，我的兄弟对那个怪物唯一的反应就是不屑的笑声。随后，他就再也没有发出声音。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族に捕虜として捕えられたとき、アーノルフがやって来て、鋭い斧で、何十人もの奴らを殺した。そしてスキアディは強大な嵐を呼び、忌まわしき敵どものジェットバイクをまるで木の葉のように猛烈な風の流れに吹き飛ばした。だが、それでも全員を殺すことはできなかった…俺たちは捕まってしまった。テルヴァンティアスは、まずスキアディを連れて行き、彼の体を…むごい姿に変えてしまった。それからアーノルフを連れて行った。何時間にも及ぶ拷問の中、兄弟は軽蔑的に笑うばかりだった。そして最後には声を発さなくなった」
languages.original_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族に捕虜として捕えられたとき、アーノルフがやって来て、鋭い斧で、何十人もの奴らを殺した。そしてスキアディは強大な嵐を呼び、忌まわしき敵どものジェットバイクをまるで木の葉のように猛烈な風の流れに吹き飛ばした。だが、それでも全員を殺すことはできなかった…俺たちは捕まってしまった。テルヴァンティアスは、まずスキアディを連れて行き、彼の体を…むごい姿に変えてしまった。それからアーノルフを連れて行った。何時間にも及ぶ拷問の中、兄弟は軽蔑的に笑うばかりだった。そして最後には声を発さなくなった」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Quand les xénos m'ont fait prisonnier, Arnoolf les a rattrapés et en a tué une bonne vingtaine avec sa grande hache. De son côté, Skyaddi a déclenché un ouragan si puissant que les motojets des abominations ont été dispersés comme des feuilles mortes aux quatre vents. Hélas, nos ennemis étaient trop nombreux et nous nous sommes fait capturer. Tervantias a commencé par Skyaddi, et il a transformé son corps en... en une monstruosité inimaginable. Ensuite, il s'en est pris à Arnoolf et l'a torturé des heures durant, mais pendant tout ce temps, mon frère n'a cessé de lui rire au nez avant de se taire à jamais. »
languages.original_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

traits.locale_text: « Quand les xénos m'ont fait prisonnier, Arnoolf les a rattrapés et en a tué une bonne vingtaine avec sa grande hache. De son côté, Skyaddi a déclenché un ouragan si puissant que les motojets non-humains ont été dispersés comme des feuilles mortes aux quatre vents. Hélas, nos ennemis étaient trop nombreux et nous nous sommes fait capturer. Tervantias a commencé par Skyaddi, et il a transformé son corps en... en une monstruosité inimaginable. Ensuite, il s'en est pris à Arnoolf et l'a torturé des heures durant, mais pendant tout ce temps, mon frère n'a cessé de lui rire au nez avant de se taire à jamais. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Als die Xenos mich gefangen genommen haben, hat Arnoolf sie eingeholt und mit seiner edlen Axt viele von ihnen getötet, und Skyaddi hat einen solch mächtigen Sturm beschworen, dass die Jetbikes der Abscheulichkeiten in die zornigen Ströme der Winde gepeitscht wurden wie Blätter. Doch nicht einmal das war genug, um sie alle zu besiegen ... Wir wurden gefangen genommen. Tervantias hat zuerst Skyaddi geholt und seinen Körper in ... etwas Undenkbares verwandelt. Dann hat er Arnoolf geholt, und in den vielen Stunden der Folter war meines Bruders einzige Antwort an den Teufel nur verächtliches Lachen. Und dann verstummte er."
languages.original_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

traits.locale_text: "Als die Xenos mich gefangen genommen haben, hat Arnoolf sie eingeholt und mit seiner edlen Axt viele von ihnen getötet, und Skyaddi hat einen solch mächtigen Sturm beschworen, dass die Jetbikes der Unmenschlichen in die zornigen Ströme der Winde gepeitscht wurden wie Blätter. Doch nicht einmal das war genug, um sie alle zu besiegen ... Wir wurden gefangen genommen. Tervantias hat zuerst Skyaddi geholt und seinen Körper in ... etwas Undenkbares verwandelt. Dann hat er Arnoolf geholt, und in den vielen Stunden der Folter war meines Bruders einzige Antwort an den Teufel nur verächtliches Lachen. Und dann verstummte er."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

languages.text: "Zenolar beni mahkûm ettiğinde Arnoolf onlara yetişip baltasıyla katletti. Skyaddi öyle güçlü bir fırtına çağırdı ki o garabetlerin jetmotorları, rüzgârın öfkeli akımına yaprak gibi sürüklendi. Fakat tüm bunlar bile hepsini yok etmeye yetmedi. Ele geçirildik. Tervantias önce Skyaddi'yi aldı ve bedenini akıl almaz bir şeye dönüştürdü. Sonra Arnoolf'u alıp ona saatlerce işkence etti. Kardeşimin o ucubeye verdiği tek cevap, küçümseyici bir kahkaha oldu. Sonra sesi kesildi."
languages.original_text: "When the xenos took me prisoner, Arnoolf caught up with them and slew a score of them with his fine axe, and Skyaddi called down a storm so mighty that the abominations' jetbikes were whipped into the winds' furious currents like leaves. But even that was not enough to take them all... We were captured. Tervantias took Skyaddi first and turned his body into... something unthinkable. Then he took Arnoolf, and during the many hours of torture, my brother's only response to the freak was disdainful laughter, and then he fell silent."

traits.locale_text: "Zenolar beni mahkûm ettiğinde Arnoolf onlara yetişti ve birkaçını baltasıyla katletmişti. Skyaddi öyle güçlü bir fırtına çağırmıştı ki o garabetlerin jetmotorları, rüzgârın öfkeli akımına yaprak gibi sürüklenmişti. Fakat tüm bunlar bile hepsini yok etmeye yetmedi. Ele geçirildik. Tervantias önce Skyaddi'yi aldı ve bedenini akıl almaz bir şeye dönüştürdü. Sonra Arnoolf'u alıp ona saatlerce işkence etti. Kardeşimin o ucubeye verdiği tek cevap, küçümseyici bir kahkahaydı. Sonra sesi kesildi."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
